resources.string: 操作完毕。你要用文件管理器分享吗？
网站证书不可信，仍要访问？
清空数据或设置关闭时清理哪些数据。
设置启动时被开启的组件。
请选择你偏爱的搜索引擎或者自定义一个。
让网站以灰度显示，可以看作“夜间模式”。
更改显示网站的字体大小。
启用远程内容，该内容不直接来自您正在访问的网站。禁用此功能会更安全，速度更快并节省数据量。但有些内容将不再显示。
Tell websites that you would prefer to save data. Supported websites will load faster.
显示图片，不勾选时可节约流量，节省加载时间。
勾选后所有的 Cookies 都会被删除。包括你信任的网站的。
允许 Cookies。Cookies 是存储在本地的一个小文件。 网站用它来记录你的使用偏好，但是也会被用作搜集私人信息。 处于广告等目的的第三方 cookies 总是禁止的。
如果你禁用了 Cookies， 你可以把你信任的网站放到白名单中，让它们可以保存 cookies。
允许使用 JavaScript。 很多网站需要 JavaScript 来实现各种功能，比如菜单、图片加载和显示等等。 但 JavaScript 也会带来风险，甚至被用来攻击。
如果禁用 JavaScript,使用白名单放过那些你信任的网站。
让 AdBlock 屏蔽恼人的广告，有些网站因此打开地更快了。
允许这些网站显示广告，开启广告拦截时有些网站会显示异常
允许网站获得您的定位， 一些网站比如谷歌地图需要此功能开启。
所有文件会被导出到 sdcard 上的“Documents”文件夹中,每次导出都会覆盖上一次导出的数据。 要想恢复数据，确保该文件夹下有符合约定文件名的文件。
每次你退出 \"FOSS 浏览器\" 上面勾选的都会被删除。
清除“索引数据库”和“本地Webview存储”
这样会删除整个数据库（起始页、书签、历史记录、白名单都会被清除）
根据你的喜好修改app行为和ui。
导入和导出各种数据（书签、历史、白名单）
To show the filter dialog long press on the bookmark icon in the overview. Decide which filters you will use.
滚动页面的时候进入全屏模式，按返回键退出全屏。
在后台打开标签并显示一个通知 如果禁用链接会直接在前台打开。
Tint some elements from the UI to match the website colors.
Pressing back will make the toolbar visible, before going back in history.
工具栏显示的时候隐藏导航键
浏览器启动的时候显示什么？启动页，书签…
关闭浏览器时弹出对话框确认。
关闭标签时弹出对话框确认。
Open the \"Overview\" on every app start.
In expanded overview the tab preview will hide. Then you have more place for your bookmarks.
Only show the tab preview when extending overview to switch tabs more comfortable.
Use gestures on the toolbar and the \"Navigation button\".
Reopen a new tab when the last tab is closed instead of exiting the browser.
导出所有数据(主页 + 预览, 历史, 书签) 到 SD 卡。你的登录数据不会被备份。
你当前的设置和数据都将被删除，继续？
浏览器是一个自由开源软件。
打开系统的“浏览器”设置页面。取决于你的系统版本，你可以授权、 清空数据等等。
看看大家对这个项目贡献了什么，或者你有兴趣参与后续开发 、反馈问题，又或者你想获取和这个项目相关的新闻？
显示当前版本有什么新变化。
你还没有输入任何内容
你真的想删除这条记录么？
已经存在了，换个名字吧

\"Browser\" needs the permission to \"read and write on your storage\". This is needed for downloading files, the build in file manager and taking screenshots. If you don\'t grant the permission yet, you can do it later in the settings.
Please grant the permission to \"read and write on your storage\" in the settings.

\"Browser\" needs the permission to \"access your location\". This is requested from some websites for example when they offer some kind of navigation. If you don\'t grant the permission yet, you can do it later in the settings.
你需要重启浏览器来应用变更，现在关闭么？
你确定要退出浏览器么？
下载完成，是否打开文件管理器？
本网站使用不安全的连接（“http”）。你是否想尝试安全的连接（“https”）？
是否备份数据？老的备份会被覆盖！

Start site
You can decide which site loads when \"FOSS Browser\" starts: By long pressing an entry in the overview (Startsite, Bookmarks, History) you can choose it. Over the menu of the overview you can also set a blank start site.

Menus and dialogs
All menus and dialogs are opened at the bottom of the screen. If the dialog is large you will first see only the upper part. If you swipe it up, the rest will get visible.
You can close them by pressing the back button, swiping them down or by clicking outside

Long press
If you long press the menu icon or the \"Navigation button\", the \"Fast toggle dialog\" will show. If you long press the \"Bookmark icon\", the \"Filter dialog\" will show.

There are two parts in the \"Overview\" (tab preview and personal data). There is an extra menu. In the settings you can change the behavior of the \"Overview\".

Tab preview
It is the upper part of the \"Overview\". To change tabs just click the preview. To close a tab long press the preview. If you swipe the tab preview up, your personal content will open.

Personal content
There are three parts: the Startsite, your Bookmarks and your History. If you long click an entry a menu with more options will appear.

On the toolbar and the \"Navigation button\" you can use gestures:

Toolbar
\u25AA swipe up/down \u2192 show Overview/nothing
\u25AA swipe left/right \u2192 change tabs

Navigation button
\u25AA swipe up/down \u2192 scroll up/down
\u25AA swipe left/right \u2192 previous/next in history

You can change this in the settings.

You can tag your bookmarks with colors. In this way you can group your bookmarks. You can open the filter dialog by long pressing the bookmark icon. If you long press on an entry, you can edit its name. In the settings you can disable unused entries.

On the following sites you have access to all important information about \"FOSS Browser\". Please read also the help dialog within the app.

\u25AA Project site: https://github.com/scoute-dich/Browser
\u25AA Changelog: https://github.com/scoute-dich/browser/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md
\u25AA FAQ: https://github.com/scoute-dich/browser/blob/master/FAQs.md
\u25AA License: https://github.com/scoute-dich/browser/blob/master/LICENSE.md
\u25AA Privacy: https://github.com/scoute-dich/browser/blob/master/PRIVACY.md

For more information visit the project site on Github: https://github.com/scoute-dich/Browser

Following open source libraries or projects are used within this software:

SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1.

https://github.com/Templarian/MaterialDesign

Ninja
Apache License Version 2.0
Matthew Lee
http://git.io/vUrEh

SimpleEncryptionLib
Apache License Version 2.0
hummatli
https://github.com/hummatli/SimpleEncryptionLib

First I would like to thank all people who contributed in any way on this project. They submitted issues, translated or helped in any other way. On following sites you can become a active member of this great community:

XDA-thread:
XDA is a great community for developers and smartphone enthusiasts. Here you can report issues, ask for new features and everything other related to \"FOSS Browser\".
https://forum.xda-developers.com/android/apps-games/app-browser-t3500091

Github:
On Github you can see the source code of \"FOSS Browser\". This is the more technical solution: open issues, ask for new features or even help developing or translating.
https://github.com/scoute-dich/browser


Following people contributed at this project. If I have forgotten anybody, please contact me:
